send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
Send to CS for refund inquiries
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo if the cx first message is ok, no, etc.
Don't use the word "off" when talking about promotions
dos_and_donts: Don't proactively offer to find pricing info, redirect them to the website instead
promo_and_exclusions: Do not offer a coupon to first time purchasers/subscribers. There is not an active discount code at this time. Use DCI shortcut

Nectar: Hi, thanks for reaching out and good question! We process orders within 3-5 business days. We usually ship via FedEx or UPS Ground. Standard delivery of your Nectar products takes approximately 2-5 business days for arrival once they ship. 

You can also use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://nectarsleep.attn.tv/av3eELzk7WOR

âžœ If the cx is facing technical website issues while accessing the link, do NOT immediately send the TESC shortcut, troubleshoot first instead

templates: For expired discounts use EXP shortcut

Gift cards can be used on discounted items

Fashion Nova: Sorry to hear you need to process a return. Visit http://sms.fashionnova.com/ayBo8fj7MK4s for the latest info. If you're not feeling your item(s), you have 30 days from delivery to return. You can start your return here: http://sms.fashionnova.com/axsvvyruDU8L. When returning an item, you can either ship it yourself using a prepaid shipping label or drop off the return at UPS using a shipping QR code. For more information, please check out the link here: http://sms.fashionnova.com/atrN-cknrzEe
why is it not allowing me to make a return..

Fashion Nova: I'm sorry to hear that! Do you mind sending me a screenshot of any error you're seeing on your end? Please note that all items ending in $.48 and .98, bodysuits, swimwear, undergarments, beauty products, cosmetics, accessories, and "Party Wear" (such as Halloween costumes) are considered final sale, non-returnable and cannot be returned for store credit.

Fashion Nova: I completely understand. It's frustrating when you're trying to make a return, and it won't go through. From the screenshot, it looks like the issue might be due to an incorrect email address.

The best way to get this resolved is to visit http://sms.fashionnova.com/at7uTahiiK8I and start an inquiry with their team. They'll be able to help you complete your return smoothly.
i only have one email. it's not that
Fashion Nova: I'm really sorry for the confusion. It looks like the email address associated with your order has a missing letter, which is why it's not working for your return.
okay well what do i do about that..
Fashion Nova: Sorry for the slow reply and I apologize for that. Please use the link I shared previously to reach out to our team about this.

send_to_cs: âžœ If there are still issues send to CS
drive_to_purchase: Unless cx specifies, default to recommending "The Bartesian Cocktail Maker"
journey_replies_process: The automated journey will ask the customer if they were satisfied with the product:
âžœ If the customer answers "No" an automated message will ask them what went wrong - when they respond use temp "Journey 1" and ESC
âžœ If the customer answers "Yes" an automated message will ask them what they liked - when they respond use temp "Journey 2" only
For the journey where customers are asked what is their preferred spirit:
âžœ If they answer incorrectly/multiple answers - send the template for the spirit they select
âžœIf they answer with multiple options - edit/combine the templates

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page
